main.java

Class ServletController

  • java.lang.Object
    • HttpServlet
      • main.java.ServletController

  • public class ServletController
extends HttpServlet
    Front controller servlet dispatches all requests to specific JSP pages. Servlet checks if request contains specific attributes and redirects request to JSP page that meets conditions.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ServletController()
      Creates EmployeeService, ProjectService, TaskService objects to invoke methods on

      • passTaskToRequest

        public HttpServletRequest passTaskToRequest(HttpServletRequest request)
                                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Passes Task object fields as request attributes. Gets specific Task ID from request parameter. Checks if Task object was obtained from Task list page or Project edit page.
        Parameters:
        request - HTTP request
        Returns:
        HTTP request with Task attributes
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • passProjectToRequest

        public HttpServletRequest passProjectToRequest(HttpServletRequest request)
                                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Passes Project object fields as request attributes. Gets specific Project ID from request parameter. Obtains Task object collection.
        Parameters:
        request - HTTP request
        Returns:
        HTTP request with Project attributes and appointed Task collection
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
